description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Hamburg exhibition to celebrate the 200th anniversary of American independence; teams train in Germany for Olympic Games in Montreal; the 1976 German Air Show includes old time and very new aircraft; Hanover holds the world's biggest Industrial Fair with exhibits from 43 countries; a trade and skill training centre at Osnabruck; the new centre of German Ballet, Hamburg.
